verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh I'm trav'ling on the hallelujah line, newline On the good old gospel train. newline I am on the right track, newline And never will go back newline To the station of sin again. newline I am trav'ling on the hallelujah line, newline On the good old gospel train. newline I need no fare, I'm riding on a pass, newline 'Tis the blood for sinners slain.
